public.name: getTintedTexture
public.help: Basically this method just needs a sprite and a color and tints the sprite with the given color.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: the color to use to tint the sprite with

public.name: roundColor
public.help: Rounds the specified color according to the PIXI.CanvasTinter.cacheStepsPerColorChannel.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: the color to round, should be a hex color

public.name: tintMethod
public.help: The tinting method that will be used.

public.name: tintPerPixel
public.help: Tint a texture pixel per pixel.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: the color to use to tint the sprite with

public.name: tintWithMultiply
public.help: Tint a texture using the "multiply" operation.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: the color to use to tint the sprite with

public.name: tintWithOverlay
public.help: Tint a texture using the "overlay" operation.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: the color to use to tint the sprite with

public.name: cacheStepsPerColorChannel
public.help: Number of steps which will be used as a cap when rounding colors.

public.name: canUseMultiply
public.help: Whether or not the Canvas BlendModes are supported, consequently the ability to tint using the multiply method.
